page.title: 05HOATH COURT FARM
page.content: The house was built in 1580.Since 1908 the farm has belonged to the Fuller family.Mr Peter Fuller + his brother James now run the farm and employ Mr Hopkins (cowman) and Mr Apps. The farm has 440 acres of land.They grow wheat(500 tons a year),peas,beans + grass seed.There are 15 fields for grazing.These are for the dairy herd of 103 British Friesian cows. In a year 118 calves are born and 38 of these are sold.The cows eat 390 tons of cattle food a year. Milking starts at 5.30 am and 3pm and takes 2 1\ hours.In winter when the cows are kept under cover a computer controls their food ration. Mr Fuller has 6 tractors and a New Holland combine.At harvest time he uses 115 gallons of diesel per week.
